Title: Allows the county of Westchester to establish a noise demonstration program
Summary: Allows the county of Westchester to establish a noise demonstration program; establishes adjudication procedures for such program; and does not allow for records associated with such to be accessed.
LawCode: Add §387, amd §§401, 1809, 1809-e & 1803, V & T L; add §371-a, Gen Muni L; amd §87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the county of Westchester to establish a noise demonstration program; to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the general municipal law, in relation to adjudications and owner liability for violating maximum allowable vehicle sound levels; to amend the public officers law, in relation to accessing records; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
